meanings.definition: A V-shaped stripe or design, especially one on the sleeve of a uniform indicating rank or length of service.
meanings.sent1: The soldier proudly displayed his chevrons on his uniform sleeve.
meanings.sent2: The chevrons on the firefighter's sleeve showed his years of service.
meanings.sent3: The chevrons on the chef's hat seemed to dance as he cooked.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like chevrons of joy lighting up the room.
meanings.sent5: The colorful chevrons added a touch of elegance to the design.

meanings.definition: A heraldic device consisting of two diagonal stripes meeting at an angle at the top.
meanings.sent1: The family crest featured intricate chevrons in its design.
meanings.sent2: The knight's shield bore the emblem of chevrons representing bravery.
meanings.sent3: The cat's fur pattern resembled tiny chevrons running along its back.
meanings.sent4: The storm clouds formed chevrons in the sky, foretelling rain.
meanings.sent5: The ancient scroll depicted mystical creatures intertwined with chevrons.
